Text: Thanks to you all, we raised $340 for #BlackLivesMatter Thanks so much for donating, sharing, and all around being active in this scary time, Take care you guys.

Today the girls and I marched along with several hundred other people in Clarksburg. We knelt in silence for 8 minutes and 46 seconds. We had a common purpose. It was peaceful. Is it enough? Of course not. But it’s something. #BlackLivesMatter @TheMoCoShow
